title: Curious George Goes to a Chocolate Factory
description: Curious George finds his sweet tooth--and plenty of chocolate--on a visit to a candy store.When George and the man with the yellow hat go shopping at a chocolate factory store, George becomes curious about how the chocolates are made. Though he starts off following the factory tour, soon he is wanders off to investigate on his own. And when George follows his curiosity there is always fun to be had!
author: Margret Rey
